game.title: Blacksmith's Lost Tools
game.objective: Retrieve the blacksmith's lost tools from the goblin cave.
game.description: The blacksmith, a local craftsman, has lost his tools while working in the goblin cave. He needs them back to continue his work and has asked you to retrieve them.

task.description: The goblin cave is located east of the village, past the forest.
task.location: East of the village, past the forest

task.objective: Defeat the goblins and retrieve the blacksmith's tools.
task.description: Once you find the goblin cave, you will need to defeat the goblins inside and retrieve the blacksmith's tools.

task.objective: Return the tools to the blacksmith.
task.description: Once you have the tools, return to the blacksmith in the village to complete the quest.
